Function reference

All functions

YMD()
Convert date type to YYYYMMDD string
YMDh()
Convert date type to YYYYMMDDHH string
YMDhm()
Convert date type to YYYYMMDDHHmm string
YMDhms()
Convert date type to YYYYMMDDHHmm string
accumulate()
Compute accumulation between forecast lead times
as_harp_parameter()
Create a harp parameter
bind_fcst()
Bind deterministic forecasts into a single data frame
fa_opts() fatar_opts()
Set options for FA decoding
new_grib_param() new_netcdf_param() new_fa_param() new_v_param() new_obsoul_param()
Make a parameter definition list for a file format
generate_filenames()
Generate filenames from a template and arguments
geofield_to_raster() raster_to_geofield()
Convert a Geofield to a Raster
get_fa_param_info()
FA parameter names
grib_opts() use_grib_key() use_grib_indicatorOfParameter() use_grib_parameterNumber() use_grib_paramId() use_grib_shortName() use_grib_key_level() use_grib_indicatorOfTypeOfLevel() use_grib_typeOfLevel() use_grib_heightAboveGround() use_grib_pressure() use_grib_hybrid() use_grib_model() use_grib_surface() use_grib_meanSea() use_grib_stepRange()
Set options for grib files
harp_params
Parameter definitions
interpolate_opts() regrid_opts() xsection_opts() subgrid_opts()
Generate Transformation Options
modify_opts()
Modify an options list
netcdf_opts()
Set Options for Reading NetCDF files
add_param_def() modify_param_def() get_param_def() show_param_defs()
Parameter definitions for reading from files
parse_harp_parameter()
Parse the parameter name and decide on level, accumulation...
read_analysis()
Read analysis data from multiple files
read_eps_interpolate()
Read ensemble forecast files and interpolate to stations.
read_forecast()
Read forecast data from multiple files
read_grid() read_grid_interpolate()
Read gridded data in various formats
read_obs()
Read point observations from multiple files
read_obs_convert()
Read observations and output to sqlite OBSTABLE file(s)
read_obs_file()
Read an observations file
read_point_forecast()
Read point forecasts from FCTABLE files
read_point_obs()
Read point observations from OBSTABLE files
rh2tdew()
Standard Magnus formula for dewpoint temperature
save_point_verif()
Save verification data
seq_dates()
Generate a sequence of dates
show_file_templates()
Show built in file templates
sqlite_opts() fctable_opts() obstable_opts()
Options for Writing SQLite files
str_datetime_to_unixtime() str_datetime_to_datetime()
Convert a date-time string to unix time
td_from_q_and_p()
Compute dewpoint temperature from specific humidity and pressure
unix2datetime()
Convert unix time to date type
unixtime_to_str_datetime()
Convert unix time to a date-time string
vfile_opts()
Generate options for vfld and vobs files
